divs: Sighting DetailsMarch 9th, 2003 as I was doing surveillance on some anhydrous tanks. At 0030hours I observed some lights that I thought was an airplane coming from thenorth heading in my direction. The object kept getting closer and closer to mylocation. I was just about to move the patrol car, because I thought the objectwas going to crash. At this time the lights stopped and hovered for a fewseconds, then in the snap of a fingure it was gone. I did not say anything tomy ride-a-long, basically because I did not know what to say. But before Icould think of anything to say my ride-a-long says Did you justsee them lights over there. The lights where white in color most of the timebut would show other faint colors, and was in the shape of a triangle. Thelights were not flashing, and I could not hear anything coming from the objectwhich was about 200 yards away.Also about a month ago, another police officer who had a possible drunk stopped,saw the same thing hovering a few miles from their location.
